thread.section_title: Reid Cycles Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Reid Cycles | reidcycles.com.au
thread.title: Susan Mann
thread.title_full: Reid Cycles reviewed by Susan Mann

author: Susan Mann
title: Susan Mann
text:
We are really happy with our purchase. Unfortunately the website is NOT mobile friendly, I had to eventually complete the order from my laptop after getting incredibly frustrated.
Also my delivery instructions were ignored twice by the courier. The permission was given to leave without a signature and the parcel was not delivered, which resulted in my daughter not having a birthday present to wake up to.
